forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 58. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. West wind 7 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
In downtown San Francisco, the weather graces the morning with a mostly sunny demeanor, though a gentle marine layer whispers in from the ocean. As of late morning, a subdued yet clean high of around 58 degrees casts a refreshing spell upon the city, coupled with a soothing west-southwest breeze that drifts between 7 to 13 mph. The lingering clouds, however, hint at a shift, promising a mostly cloudy night ahead with temperatures slipping to about 50 degrees. 

The scene outside enchants with an undeniable freshness, inviting you to stroll through nearby parks or. Seek the comforting embrace of a café, particularly one with window-side seating, where you can sip a warm drink and watch the world unfurl. A light jacket, perhaps accompanied by a cozy scarf, will serve you well against the chill that may creep in as the sun starts to mellow. Today, embrace the opportunity to explore the vibrant streets or linger in a quiet corner with a book, savoring both the sunny moments and the soft transition into evening.
